title: public_address was not set, DistributedDataParallel
body_html:
Running with --nproc_per_node=1 instead of --nproc_per_node=2, I get this error...

Issue description

$ python3 -m torch.distributed.launch --nproc_per_node=1 --master_port=1234 abcd.py
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "abcd.py", line 9, in <module>
    torch.distributed.init_process_group(backend='nccl')
  File "/home/michaelp/.local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/distributed/__init__.py", line 94, in init_process_group
    group_name, rank)
RuntimeError: public_address was not set in config at /pytorch/torch/lib/THD/process_group/General.cpp:17

Code example

import argparse
import torch

if __name__ == '__main__':
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
    parser.add_argument("--local_rank", type=int)
    args = parser.parse_args()

    torch.distributed.init_process_group(backend='nccl')

System Info
